channel.title: No1 can connect to me
channel.description:
Hello, thanks for checking this post out ;)
The problem is, that no1 can connect to my server, windows firewall turned off (+ 43594 opened) and also the routers firewall is turned off. And the portforwarding.com guide for my router is all out-of-date, my router hasn't even got a "port forward"-option, and i don't know what to chose instead.. :mad: Sending all kind of pictures if it would help solving this problem, tell me what to take a pic of ;)

item.title: No1 can connect to me

(its not the same software as in the rr24 guide you find on portforward.com )
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 21, 2008, 06:27:32 AM[/size][hr]sorry but i have tried gettin this work almost 2 years now, please help?

item.title: No1 can connect to me
item.dc:creator: @dantsu dantsu
item.description:
@dantsu wrote:

A-Link RR24ap(i+)
It seems to be a newer model of the old “RR24”
[its NOT the same one as this http://www.portforward.com/english/routers/port_forwarding/A-Link/RR24/RR24index.htm ]
